statements: SELECT * FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE creative_name = 'Banner Ad'
SELECT creative_id, ad_unit_id, bid_amount FROM creatives_and_ad_placements ORDER BY bid_amount DESC
SELECT creative_name, ad_placement_id FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE bid_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE ad_placement_id = '12345'
SELECT MAX(bid_amount) AS max_bid FROM creatives_and_ad_placements
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, bid_amount FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE ad_placement_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE bid_amount > 100.50 ORDER BY creative_name ASC;
SELECT creative_name, ad_unit_id FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE bid_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT creative_id, bid_amount FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE creative_name LIKE '%Promo%' OR creative_name LIKE '%Discount%';
SELECT creative_id, bid_amount FROM creatives_and_ad_placements WHERE ad_placement_id = 'a7eacb9e-7a74-4935-b4aa-af3686335de0' AND ad_unit_id = 'f70c5591-059d-4717-9ce6-0fdf44b9e579';
SELECT * FROM creatives;
SELECT creative_name, creative_type FROM creatives WHERE creative_type = 'banner';
SELECT placement_name, ad_format FROM ad_placements ORDER BY placement_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM creatives WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT placement_name, bid_amount FROM ad_placements WHERE bid_amount > 100 ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM creatives WHERE creative_type = 'Banner' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT placement_name, placement_type, ad_format FROM ad_placements WHERE bid_amount > 100 ORDER BY placement_name;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, created_at FROM creatives WHERE creative_type = 'Video' AND creative_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM creatives JOIN ad_placements ON creatives.creative_id = ad_placements.placement_id WHERE creatives.creative_type = 'Banner' AND ad_placements.bid_amount < 200 ORDER BY ad_placements.bid_amount DESC;
SELECT placement_type, SUM(bid_amount) AS total_bid FROM ad_placements GROUP BY placement_type HAVING total_bid > 500 ORDER BY total_bid DESC;
SELECT * FROM creatives;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, creative_type FROM creatives ORDER BY creative_id DESC;
SELECT ad_placement_id, placement_name, cost_per_click FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_format='Banner';
SELECT creative_name, creative_size FROM creatives WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT delivery_date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_delivery WHERE ad_placement_id = 3 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM creatives ORDER BY creative_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, creative_type, created_at FROM creatives WHERE creative_type = 'Banner' AND creative_size = '300x250';

SELECT cp.ad_placement_id, cp.placement_name, COUNT(ad.ad_placement_id) AS total_ads FROM ad_placements cp LEFT JOIN creatives ad ON cp.ad_placement_id = ad.ad_placement_id GROUP BY cp.ad_placement_id, cp.placement_name ORDER BY total_ads DESC;

SELECT ad.creative_id, ad.delivery_id, d.delivery_date, d.impressions, d.clicks, d.conversions FROM ad_delivery d JOIN creatives ad ON d.creative_id = ad.creative_id WHERE d.clicks > 100 ORDER BY d.delivery_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.placement_name, SUM(d.impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(d.clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(d.conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_placements a JOIN ad_delivery d ON a.ad_placement_id = d.ad_placement_id GROUP BY a.placement_name ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM creatives;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name FROM creatives;
SELECT ad_placement_id, placement_name FROM ad_placements ORDER BY placement_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_placement_id, AVG(num_clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM ad_analytics GROUP BY ad_placement_id HAVING avg_clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM creatives WHERE creative_name LIKE 'Awesome%'
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, ad_placement_id FROM creatives WHERE ad_placement_id = 3 ORDER BY creative_name DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT ad_placement_id, SUM(num_impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_analytics GROUP BY ad_placement_id HAVING total_impressions > 10000
SELECT placement_name, device_type FROM ad_placements WHERE device_type IN ('Mobile', 'Desktop') ORDER BY placement_name ASC
SELECT * FROM creatives;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, creative_type FROM creatives WHERE creative_type = 'Banner';
SELECT placement_name, placement_type FROM ad_placements WHERE placement_type = 'Sidebar' ORDER BY placement_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT group_name, campaign_id FROM ad_groups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_groups JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_groups.campaign_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id;

SELECT ad_targets.target_name, ad_placements.placement_name, ad_groups.group_name FROM ad_targets JOIN ad_groups ON ad_targets.group_id = ad_groups.group_id JOIN ad_placements ON ad_targets.placement_id = ad_placements.placement_id;
SELECT creative_name, creative_type FROM creatives WHERE creative_type='Banner' ORDER BY creative_name DESC;
SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, COUNT(ad_groups.group_id) AS group_count FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_groups ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_groups.campaign_id GROUP BY ad_campaigns.campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM ad_groups WHERE group_name='Group A');
